meanings.definition: To stamp (a mark or design) on the back of something.
meanings.sent1: The artist backstamped their logo on the painting.
meanings.sent2: The company backstamped each product with a unique code.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat backstamped its paw print on the freshly painted wall.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was backstamped in everyone's memory like a permanent mark.
meanings.sent5: The memory of their laughter was backstamped in my mind.

meanings.definition: A mark or design stamped on the back of something.
meanings.sent1: The backstamped symbol on the document indicated its authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The collector was thrilled to find a rare backstamped coin.
meanings.sent3: The backstamped signature on the painting made it a valuable piece.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was a backstamped emblem on his character.
meanings.sent5: The backstamped seal on the letter ensured its origin.
